body: the art is nice, thanks for the explanation, but this is pretty disgusting 🤦‍♂️

The true intent of the antagonist was to use Rosari as a lifepoint generator since her pet can fuck Rosari to steal her lifepoint. 

The ring shown in page 40 was actually a slave ring. Rosari can choose being a slave to the antagonist all getting fucked until she died.

She choose the former one. Not knowing that that antagonist lied to her again. The antagonist then give her an order by telling Rosari to become the monster's wife.


TL:DR : Protagonist got lied and become a fuckhole for a monster that is now her husband.

Let me explain the entire story so you can understand

The female protagonist name is Rosari Blanche (might be wrong). She was formally a princess but due to some reason she become an adventurer.

She can't use any magic due to a curse that was plant on her neck.
BUT the curse allows her to have a special power called the Red Demonic Sword.
This sword can cut through anything. Using it comes with a cost as well. As a result her body will become very fatigue and very sensitive.


The story starts with Rosari escape from the cave because she is not fully prepared to face the enemy inside.

The antagonist (no name) which was outside the cave saw and told Rosari that all her party members were captured inside the cave including her husband.

Bla bla bla, she enter the cave, got ambush. 

On page 15 it says that she has used up all her recovery items.

Now we skip to page 29, she was squirting.
She was left no choice but to use the Red Demonic Sword to save herself.
I cant understand wtf is going on but it's good anyways.
I can't read it but it's some S tier art
